mapper.sql: RID, RNAME, UNAME, RCONTENT, STATUS, PICTURE, TIME, DEALPEOPLE, DEALTIME, DEALRESULT
mapper.insert: insert into reporting (RID, RNAME, UNAME, RCONTENT, STATUS, PICTURE, TIME, DEALPEOPLE, DEALTIME, DEALRESULT) values (#{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dealpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dealresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update reporting
RNAME = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RCONTENT = #{rcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DEALPEOPLE = #{dealpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALTIME = #{dealtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEALRESULT = #{dealresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RID = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
